ComicInfo.Summary: The Chrysalis Affair - Part 2: The team is subdued and interrogated by FLAG agents, but Augie realizes that they are innocent and agrees to help Slingshot free the others. Captured by Chrysalis and her daughter Synergy, Maddie transforms into Whiptail to fight them.
ComicInfo.Title: The Chrysalis Affair - Part 2
